full_output.summary: Analytical and detail-oriented Data Analyst with hands-on experience in data visualization, statistical analysis, and machine learning. Proficient in Python, SQL, and Power BI with a track record of leveraging data to drive actionable insights and optimize business strategies. Demonstrated expertise in developing predictive models, creating interactive dashboards, and conducting comprehensive data analysis to support decision-making processes. Adept at identifying trends and patterns, optimizing data processing workflows, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals. Currently enhancing skills through certifications in Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst and AWS Cloud Technology, with a strong commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

projects.name: Interactive Covid-19 Trends Analysis
projects.description: Developed an interactive tool to analyze COVID-19 trends across Indian states, incorporating geospatial visualizations like choropleth maps and time series charts using Plotly and Folium. Engineered a dynamic UI for state-wise comparisons, boosting data exploration and user engagement by 20%, with optimized sub-second load times for over 1 million rows. Conducted thorough data cleaning and analysis to identify trends in cases, recoveries, and deaths, while ensuring cross-browser compatibility and maintaining detailed documentation.

projects.name: Credit Risk Analysis Dashboard (Using Power BI)
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard for credit risk assessment, integrating machine learning to predict loan defaults. Created interactive visualizations for dynamic analysis of risk metrics and trends.

projects.name: Heart Disease prediction
projects.description: Developed a heart disease prediction model, improving accuracy by 15% and reducing errors by 20% through hyperparameter tuning, feature engineering, and data preprocessing. Conducted exploratory data analysis to identify key trends and relationships, selecting the best algorithm based on accuracy and ROC-AUC. Deployed the model using Flask for real-time predictions.

experiences.description: Conducted data analysis on global population datasets (2020) and identified key trends across over 150 countries, visualizing the distribution and achieving a 30% reduction in data exploration time using Python. Performed exploratory data analysis and feature engineering on the Titanic dataset, addressing 20% of missing data issues, leading to a 15% increase in model accuracy for predicting passenger survival rates. Built and optimized a Decision Tree classifier for a bank marketing dataset, achieving 85% accuracy in predicting customer responses, which improved campaign targeting efficiency by 25%. Led sentiment analysis on Twitter datasets using logistic regression, with a preprocessing pipeline that improved model performance by 20%, accurately classifying over 50,000 tweets with 90% precision. Analyzed UK accident data to identify hotspots and patterns based on weather and road conditions, providing actionable insights that contributed to a 10% improvement in local traffic safety measures.

full_output.name: Sanskriti Ojha
